overview: 3 rookie adventurers go on a quest for a lost treasure, but what they donâ€™t know, is that they are being followed. They arrive at their final destination: the lava pit when suddenly, they are ambushed by an evil vampire who has been following them throughout their adventure. Now faced with the possibility of a gruesome fate, the 3 adventurers must put aside their differences and take down the foe together.
tagline: Pineapple on pizza, yes or no?
title: The Lost Cream of Pedites
